Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by Houston in 2006...
Traded from Houston to New York (N) on 7/31/2008 (Going to HOU: LF J. Bay. Going to NYN: CF C. Duffy, RF C. Heisey)...
Injured on 8/6/2009 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/9/2010, off Scott Downs (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 9/3/2010, off Stephen Strasburg (WSH)...
Injured on 5/11/2013 with a Strained Calf Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 2/7/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $2,222,222 per year...
Traded from Kansas City to Los Angeles (A) on 4/1/2017 (Going to KCA: 2B R. Weeks. Going to LAA: LF A. Lind, LF C. Heisey, 3B D. Johnson)...
Injured on 8/28/2018 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Los Angeles (A) to Minnesota on 2/23/2019 (Going to MIN: RF C. Heisey, CF R. Bernadina, 2B D. Young. Going to LAA: P D. Muldoon)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 8/21/2019...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles (A) on 4/17/2022 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/6/2022 with a Bruised Foot, out for 5 days...
